section.title: Overview of Organizational Unit Manager (OUM)
section.para: For the first release, the Organizational Unit Manager (OUM) offers services in the following areas:

listitem.para: Every Organizational Unit will be described in the system with a set of properties.
Each Organizational Unit may have one or more subunits.
An Organizational Unit may be subordinated to one or more Organizational Unit.
There is no limitation in the depth of the organizational Structure.
These kind of relation between Organizational Units is handled by the Organizational Unit Manager. Later releases will support the Organizational Unit History, too.

section.para: There are services, which support creation, persistent identification, updating, retrieval of Organizational Units and their structures. Later releases will support Organizational Unit history and changing of the status of an Organizational Unit, too.
